Container.Name: photoshow
Container.Overview: Photoshow(https://github.com/thibaud-rohmer/PhotoShow) is gallery software at its easiest, it doesn't even require a database.
Container.Changes:
### 2021-01-23 - Rebasing to alpine 3.13.
### 2020-06-01 - Rebasing to alpine 3.12.
### 2019-12-19 - Rebasing to alpine 3.11.
### 2019-09-23 - Adding PHP-Exif for image metadata and processing.
### 2019-06-28 - Rebasing to alpine 3.10.
### 2019-03-23 - Switching to new Base images, shift to arm32v7 tag.
### 2019-02-22 - Rebasing to alpine 3.9.
### 2019-01-16 - Add pipeline logic and multi arch.
### 2018-09-05 - Rebase to alpine 3.8.
### 2018-01-07 - Rebase to alpine 3.7.
### 2017-05-25 - Rebase to alpine 3.6.
### 2017-05-03 - Use repo pinning to better solve dependencies, use repo version of php7-imagick.
### 2017-02-14 - Rebase to alpine 3.5.
### 2016-10-14 - Add version layer information.
### 2016-09-30 - Rebase to alpine linux.
### 2016-09-11 - Add layer badges to README.
### 2015-08-21 - Use patched keybaord js from fork of photoshow.
### 2015-08-21 - Initial Release.

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: Stores config and logs for nginx base.

Config.Name: Path: /Pictures
Config.Description: Your local folder of photos you wish to share.

Config.Name: Path: /Thumbs
Config.Description: Local folder to store thumbnails of your images.
